resources.string: Do you want to delete this picture?
Hitchhiker\'s thumb in front ot a planet

Funny, just when you think life can\’t possibly get any worse 
 it suddenly does.
 This is the Hitchhiker's Guide.
 It won't help though.
 It rarely does.
Here\'s your current picture of the night sky. How I hate the night.\n Use the SAVE IMAGE button to save an image to the Image List.\n Wretched, isn\'t it?
User profile can been found and updated here.\n Use the pencil icon to edit username, and click the photo for a space travel tip.\n I don\'t know why you\'d bother.

Here I am, brain the size of a planet,
 and they tell me to take you up to the list of images you have saved.
 Short click an item to view the details, long click to remove it from the list.
 This is the sort of thing you lifeforms enjoy, is it?
Pick a date to find a new image, then click the CHOOSE DATE button to view the image.\n It won\'t make you happy though.

I think you ought to know I\’m feeling very depressed.
 Space Jokes make me sad.
 Click on Zaphod to get a new joke, click the GET ANSWER button to see the answer.
 I won't enjoy it.
Space is big. You just won\'t believe how vastly, hugely, mind-bogglingly big it is. I mean, you may think it\'s a long way down the road to the chemist\'s, but that\'s just peanuts to space.
A towel is about the most massively useful thing an interstellar hitchhiker can have.
